# remove(id:)

**Instance Method**

Remove an instance by name.

## Declaration

```swift
@discardableResult mutating func remove(id: String) -> MeshResource.Instance?
```

## Using the collection

- **count**: Number of instances.
- **isEmpty**: True if there are no instances.
- **insert(_:)**: Add a new instance to the container. Returns true if added. Returns false if it already exists.
- **removeAll()**: Remove all the instances.
- **update(_:)**: Update an existing instance. The old instance is returned.

items.description: True if there are no instances.
